16 
17 #define MAP_ITEM_NAME_SIZE 15
18 #define MAP_ITEM_DESC_SIZE 128
19 
20 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
21  uint32_t nsegments;
22 } map_track_options_t;
23 
24 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
25  uint32_t npoints;
26 } map_track_segment_options_t;
27 
28 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
29  uint8_t type;
30  uint8_t resd[3];
31  loc_coord_t coord;
32 } map_item_point_entry_t;
33 
34 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
35  map_item_point_entry_t point;
36  char name[MAP_ITEM_NAME_SIZE];
37  char desc[MAP_ITEM_DESC_SIZE];
38  union {
39  loc_velocity_t velocity;
40  uint32_t npoints;
41  };
42 } map_item_t;
43 
44 class MapItem : public Item<map_item_t>{
45 public:
46  MapItem();
47  MapItem(const map_item_t & item);
48 
49  const char * name() const { return item().name; }
50  const char * desc() const { return item().desc; }
51  const loc_coord_t coord() const { return item().point.coord; }
52 
53  void set_name(const char * name);
54  void set_desc(const char * desc);
55  void set_coord(loc_coord_t coord);
56 
57  void set_type(uint8_t type);
58  const uint8_t type() const { return _item.point.type; }
59  void set_npoints(int npoints){ _item.npoints = npoints; }
60 
61  static int set_icon(uint8_t type, Icon * icon);
62  inline int set_icon(Icon * icon){
63  return set_icon(_item.point.type, icon);
64  }
65 
66  inline float lat() const { return _item.point.coord.lat; }
67  inline float lon() const { return _item.point.coord.lon; }
68  inline float ele() const { return _item.point.coord.ele; }
69  inline float elevation() const { return _item.point.coord.ele; }
70  inline uint32_t npoints() const { return _item.npoints; }
71 
72  enum {
73  MAP_TYPE_NONE = 0,
74  MAP_TYPE_WAYPOINT = 1,
75  MAP_TYPE_TRACK = 2,
76  MAP_TYPE_TRACK_SEGMENT = 3,
77  MAP_TYPE_TRACK_POINT = 4 | 0x80, //0x080 means just write the point -- no name, desc etc
78  MAP_TYPE_ROUTE = 5,
79  MAP_TYPE_POINT = 6 | 0x80,
80  MAP_TYPE_POINT_SEGMENT = 7,
81  MAP_TYPE_BOUNDS = 8,
82  MAP_TYPE_MARKER = 9,
83  MAP_TYPE_PERSON = 10,
84 
85  MAP_TYPE_PEAK = 11,
86  MAP_TYPE_TOTAL
87  };
88 
89  static const char * gpx_type(uint8_t type);
90  const char * gpx_type(){
91  return gpx_type(this->type());
92  }
93 
94 };
